title: Dispute over Product XYZ
description: Buyer claims the product received is defective, while the seller asserts that the product was shipped in perfect condition.
creator: john doe

comments.creator: Tharshen
comments.comment: The product I received is completely broken, and it doesn't work at all.

comments.creator: john doe
comments.comment: I shipped the product in perfect condition. You must have damaged it after receiving it.

comments.creator: Tharshen
comments.comment: That's not true! It was broken right out of the box. I need a refund or a replacement.

comments.creator: john doe
comments.comment: Sorry, but I have proof from the courier that the package was intact when it was delivered.

comments.creator: Tharshen
comments.comment: That doesn't mean the product wasn't defective when you sent it. I can send photos of the damage.

comments.creator: john doe
comments.comment: Please send the photos, and I will assess the situation.

comments.creator: Tharshen
comments.comment: Photos sent. Check your messages. (img) (img)

comments.creator: john doe
comments.comment: What are you talking about? That looks like it was deliberately damage. Also, how come only your shipping has issues when many of customers never had any???

title: Dispute over Late Delivery of Custom Shoes
description: Buyer ordered custom-made shoes that arrived two weeks late. Seller claims delays were due to manufacturing issues.
creator: Buyer (Alice)

comments.creator: Alice
comments.comment: The shoes were supposed to arrive in 10 days, but I received them two weeks late. This is unacceptable!

comments.creator: Bob's Custom Shoes
comments.comment: I apologize for the delay, but there were unforeseen issues with the manufacturer. Its beyond my control.

comments.creator: Alice
comments.comment: Then why didnt you inform me about the delay? I had no updates and no product for weeks.

comments.creator: Bob's Custom Shoes
comments.comment: I was waiting for confirmation from the manufacturer. I shouldve updated you sooner. Can I offer you a discount?

comments.creator: Bob's Custom Shoes
comments.comment: A discount??? I expect a full refund!

title: Dispute over Dress Color
description: Buyer claims the dress color is completely different from what was advertised. Seller insists it's the correct color.
creator: Buyer (Sophia)

comments.creator: Sophia
comments.comment: The dress I received is blue, but the picture clearly shows a green dress. This is false advertising.

comments.creator: TrendOutfit
comments.comment: The color may look slightly different due to lighting in the pictures, but its definitely the same item.

comments.creator: Sophia
comments.comment: It's not a slight difference. It's a completely different color! I want a refund or exchange.

comments.creator: TrendOutfit
comments.comment: Im very sure the we sent the correct one. Send me a photo and i will take a look.

title: Dispute over Denied Access to an Online Course
description: Buyer purchased an online course but was never granted access. Seller says the course is no longer available.
creator: Buyer (Liam)

comments.creator: Liam
comments.comment: I paid for the online course, but I can't access it. What's going on?

comments.creator: EduTech
comments.comment: The course was discontinued last week. We’ve sent a notification about this.

comments.creator: Liam
comments.comment: I didnt receive any notification. I want a full refund or access to an alternative course.

comments.creator: EduTech
comments.comment: We can offer a refund or a coupon for another course. Please let us know what you'd prefer.

title: Dispute over Damaged Laptop
description: Buyer received a laptop with a cracked screen. Seller claims the damage occurred during shipping.
creator: Buyer (Michael)

comments.creator: Buyer (Michael)
comments.comment: The laptop arrived with a cracked screen. I demand a replacement or a refund.

comments.creator: Seller (TechWorld)
comments.comment: The laptop was inspected before shipping. The damage must have happened during transit.

comments.creator: Buyer (Michael)
comments.comment: That’s not my responsibility. The product should arrive in perfect condition.

comments.creator: Seller (TechWorld)
comments.comment: We'll file a claim with the shipping company and work out a solution for you.

title: Dispute over Web Design Service
description: Buyer claims that the delivered web design doesn't meet the agreed-upon specifications. Seller insists the work is satisfactory.
creator: Buyer (Lucas)

comments.creator: Buyer (Lucas)
comments.comment: The web design you delivered is far from what we agreed on. Its not responsive and looks outdated.

comments.creator: Seller (DesignPros)
comments.comment: The design follows the guidelines we discussed. Its responsive and built according to modern standards.

comments.creator: Buyer (Lucas)
comments.comment: Its definitely not what I expected. I need revisions or a refund.

comments.creator: Seller (DesignPros)
comments.comment: We can offer minor revisions, but we can't completely redo the design without additional charges.
